price: 6. Pour que tu avertisses des gens dont les pères n’ont pas été avertis, et qui donc sont distraits.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
